name: Appleberry
description: Appleberry by Sumo Seeds in an indica-dominant yield machine. Bred from (Dynamite x Bubblelicious) x White Widow, this strain has classic Central Asian and Central American roots while expressing a terpene profile all its own. The strain’s aroma exemplifies its title, smelling of a subtle apple and berry. Its effects are extremely relaxing, bordering on sedative, imbuing the limbs with a warm weighted aura. Utilize Appleberry as an anxiolytic and for all-around pain relief. Appleberry won 1st place in the "Bio" category at the 2016 Highlife Cup in Amsterdam.
descriptionPlain: Appleberry by Sumo Seeds in an indica-dominant yield machine. Utilize Appleberry as an anxiolytic and for all-around pain relief. Appleberry won 1st place in the "Bio" category at the 2016 Highlife Cup in Amsterdam.

highlightedReviews.text: vape- burns quick, tastes good and mellow chill high. Bowl- on stuck at times but still mellow.

Vaped this after a long & painful day at work. 
Day was hot & grossly humid. Got some Taco Bell at night. Saw my next door neighbor smoking something good next door & asked if he had any to share, & he gave me this baby. 
Went inside to eat. Put on my fave YouTubers (FunHaus). Sat down & took a few hits.
Immediately tasted apples & berries! Shit tasted so good that I took a few big boy hits by accident lol. 
Ate all my Taco Bell. Chicken chalupas & a caramel apple empanada! 
I’m not gonna lie, I had a chubby going on... 
After about 30mins, I realize I haven’t taken a hit in awhile... & immediately realize that I was still so high that I forgot I was smoking. 
Had a really good head high going on. Very smooth & clean. Felt a bit warm & fuzzy. Made me very happy. 
Took a few more hits & strengthened that already nice buzz even more! 
Ended up wanting to watch Judge Dredd pretty badly & wanting to share on twitter on how much I love this strain!
Then finally ended up here. Creating an account just to post this lol. 

Happy smoking!
